note.p: Death: St Bartholomew's vicarage, London (04 September 1861)
Education: Christ's College, Cambridge. BA (1796); MA (1799)
Career: Ordained deacon (1798); ordained priest (1800); presented to the living of Inwood, Essex (1802); Vicar, St Bartholomew the Less, London (1808); President, Sion College
References: W H Brock, 'The Selection of the Authors of the Bridgewater Treatises' in NR 1966 vol 21 pp 162-179
